name: Forgejo
longDescription: Brought to you by an inclusive community under the umbrella of Codeberg e.V., a democratic non-profit organization, Forgejo can be trusted to be exclusively Free Software. It includes and cooperates with hundreds of projects (Gitea, Git, ...) and is focused on scaling, federation and privacy.
description: Forgejo is a self-hosted lightweight software forge. Easy to install and low maintenance, it just does the job.
